I. 	INTRODUCTION
	On December 20, 2019, the Court held a status conference and ordered the parties to 	
personally meet and confer in an effort to resolve this dispute without further Court intervention. Counsel for the parties met in person on January 8, 2020 in Las Vegas, Nevada and engaged in lengthy settlement discussion. While the parties did not resolve this matter, they made progress towards a potential resolution.
	On January 13, 2020, counsel for Shift4 sent a settlement proposal to counsel for CardConnect. A true and correct copy of this proposal is attached hereto as Exhibit 1. On January 21, 2020, counsel for CardConnect sent a counter-proposal to counsel for Shift4. A true and correct copy of this document is attached hereto as Exhibit 2. The parties were unable to come to an agreement, but their respective positions are not far apart. Both parties remain willing to engage in a private mediation or settlement conference with a Magistrate Judge. The parties have reached out to Magistrate Judge Koppe’s chambers to inquire about scheduling a settlement conference. The parties will reach out to her chambers again next week.
	The parties are also submitting the following proposed schedule for the remainder of this case.
II. 	DISCOVERY STATUS

A. 	Completed Discovery.

	Shift4 produced an additional 22,855 pages of documents on November 26, 2019	and CardConnect produced an additional 198 pages of documents. The parties each served responses and objections to the other party’s first set of written discovery requests. The depositions of Shift4’s 30(b)(6) witnesses Jarett Jones and Michael Russo were taken. Per the parties’ agreement, the deposition of CardConnect’s 30(b)(6) representative was taken on December 13, 2019 in Las Vegas.
		The parties exchanged initial expert disclosures on January 10, 2020.

    B. 	Remaining Discovery.

	Fact discovery closed on December 13, 2019. The parties will take expert depositions 	the week of January 27, 2020. Rebuttal expert disclosures are due on February 4, 2020.
    C. Dispositive Motions.
	The parties each intend to file Motions for Summary Judgment.
III. 	PROPOSED SCHEDULE
	The parties propose that expert depositions be completed by January 31, 2020. The 	
parties propose the following schedule for the remainder of this case:
Event 	Proposed Deadline
Rebuttal Expert Disclosures 	February 4, 2020
Close of Expert Discovery 	February 11, 2020
Dispositive Motions 	February 25, 2020
Responses to Dispositive Motions	 March 10, 2020
Replies to Dispositive Motions 	March 17, 2020
Joint Pre-Trial Order 	April 6, 2020 or 20 days after rulings on dispositive motions
DATED this 24th day of January, 2020.
